data.enText: the act or process of buying sth
to make a purchase (= buy sth)

data.chText: 保存好收据作为购货凭证。
data.enText: Keep your receipt as proof of purchase .

data.chText: 这家公司刚刚宣布以2 700万英镑买下了帕克宾馆。
data.enText: The company has just announced its £27 million purchase of Park Hotel.

data.chText: 新汽车之类的巨额购买项目
data.enText: major purchases, such as a new car

data.chText: 所购之物若不合意，我们将全额退款。
data.enText: If you are not satisfied with your purchase we will give you a full refund.
a firm hold on sth with the hands or feet, for example when you are climbing

data.chText: 她设法抓牢光滑的岩石。
data.enText: She tried to get a purchase on the slippery rock.

data.chText: 这种设备可从您当地的供应商购买。
data.enText: The equipment can be purchased from your local supplier.

data.chText: 他们以100万元买下了这块土地。
data.enText: They purchased the land for $1 million.

data.chText: 这次胜利的代价太大了。
data.enText: Victory was purchased (= achieved) at too great a price.

ex.chText: 那本书你是在哪里买的？
ex.enText: Where did you buy that book?
She bought that piano for 3000 yuan.
Let me buy you a drink.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，既可指日常随意购物也可指购买大件物品，可后接双宾语。

ex.chText: 你在哪里买的那条裙子？
ex.enText: Where did you get/buy that dress?

ex.chText: 我妈妈给我买了一双新鞋。
ex.enText: My mummy got/bought me a pair of new shoes.

synonyms.bx: 作此义解时较口语化，可与 buy 换用。

ex.chText: 她在上海购买了一幢别墅。
ex.enText: She has purchased a villa in Shanghai.

synonyms.bx: 词义同 buy，但更为正式，且不可后接双宾语。

tr: the acquisition of something for payment
example: they closed the purchase with a handshake

tr: a means of exerting influence or gaining advantage
example: he could get no purchase on the situation

tr: the mechanical advantage gained by being in a position to use a lever
acquire by means of a financial transaction
example: The family purchased a new car
The conglomerate acquired a new company
She buys for the big department store

value.def: When you purchase something, you buy it.

example.ex: He purchased a ticket and went up on the top deck...
example.tran: 他买了一张票，然后上到顶层甲板。

example.ex: Most of those shares were purchased from brokers.
example.tran: 大部分的股份是从经纪人手中购得的。

example.ex: The broker will get 5% if he finds a purchaser...
example.tran: 找到一个买家，经纪人就能提成5%。

example.ex: The group is the second largest purchaser of fresh fruit in the US.
example.tran: 该集团是美国新鲜水果的第二大买主。

value.def: The purchase of something is the act of buying it.

example.ex: Some of the receipts had been for the purchase of cars.
example.tran: 其中一些收据是购买汽车时开的。

value.def: A purchase is something that you buy.

example.ex: She opened the tie box and looked at her purchase. It was silk, with maroon stripes.
example.tran: 她打开领带盒，看着她买回的东西：一条带有褐红色条纹的丝制领带。

value.def: If you get a purchase on something, you manage to get a firm grip on it.

example.ex: I got a purchase on the rope and pulled...
example.tran: 我紧抓住绳子，用力去拉。

example.ex: I couldn't get any purchase with the screwdriver on the damn screws.
example.tran: 我用螺丝刀拧那些该死的螺丝钉时一点也使不上劲儿。

trans: 买卖合同；購貨合同；合同；购货合同；购买合同
购人成本；采购成本；购买成本；购置成本；购入成本
优先购买权；优先认购权
路易西安纳购地；路易斯安那购地
购货折扣；付款迅速的；进货折扣
请购单；采购申请；一般请购；请购；申购单
认购期权；购买选择权；购买期权；留购权
